SA02n800:6: atha vajrapāṇinirmāṇakāyaḥ sucandro rājā paramādibuddhatantrarāje sekārthaṃ	bhagavantaṃ pṛcchati |
SA02n800:7: sucandra āheti he śāstaḥ sekaḥ saptavidha udakādyanujñāvasānaḥ |
SA02n800:14: śṛṇv ityādi bhagavato vākyam uddeśasamāptiṃ yāvat |
SA02n800:34: sa eva hi saṃgītikārakaiḥ pṛthak kriyate tadānyatantro bhavati |
SA02n800:42: mahoddeśaś ceti cakrārād mahacchabdākṣepe mahānirdeśa ucyate |
SA02n800:43: dvayam etad yathāsaṃkhyam alpaṭīkā bṛhaṭṭīkā cocyate |
SA02n800:44: evam ity uktakrameṇa ṣaṭkoṭibhiḥ ṣaḍvidhair alpatantrabṛhattantrasaṃgītyādikaiḥ śuddhaṃ pariśuddham ādibuddhaṃ kālacakrābhidhānakaṃ syād iti vakṣyamāṇena saṃbandhaḥ |
SA02n800:54: kāyavākcittasaṃśuddhyā abhiṣekadvayaṃ dvayam ity udakamukuṭābhyāṃ kāyaśuddham |
SA02n800:58: anyair aparā yā śuddhiḥ sā dhātvādiśuddhitaḥ | (40)
SA02n800:64: kumbhādayas tu sekā maṇḍalavartanam antareṇāpi deyāḥ |
SA02n800:66: janakaḥ sarvatāyinām iti tāyināṃ pañcatathāgatānāṃ nirāvaraṇatvena janakaḥ |
SA02n800:68: ata evāha | astināstivyatikrāntair ity abhāva ityādi |
SA02n800:72: tatra pratyakṣapūrvakaṃ tad vyapagatasakalakalpanākalaṅkaṃ sadgurumārgopadeśajātatattvayogād gaganetārācakravad anekasaṃbhogakāyaṃ māṃsacakṣurgrāhyam |
SA02n800:73: prathamaṃ māṃsacakṣuṣādikarmiyogi viśvam abhijñām antareṇa paśyati | (41)
SA02n800:80: evaṃ tathāgatasya pañcacakṣūṃṣi māṃsādīni śūnyatādarśanaṃ praty uktāni |
SA02n800:81: anumānapūrvakam ālambanārthaṃ tattvataḥ kalpanaṃ citrādopadarśitaṃ bālayogināṃ śūnyatāmārgāvatāranārtham |
SA02n800:82: tasmād abhāve bimbe svapnādisadṛśe yā bhāvanālambanaṃ sā yogināṃ bhāvanā kalpanā na bhavaty akalitahetūdbhūtatvāt |
SA02n800:85: cittasya yataḥ pratibhāsamānam apahnotuṃ na śakyate |
SA02n800:86: aṇusaṃdohā bhāvāś ca na gṛhyate pratibimbavat |
SA02n800:95: asyāḥ pratisenāyā dṛśyamānāyā yo bhāvaḥ pratibhāsalakṣaṇaḥ sa na bhāvaḥ syāt tad vastu na bhavati |
SA02n800:104: cintāmaṇir ivetyādi kalpanāpoḍhatvam abhrāntatvaṃ ca jñānasyāha |
SA02n800:105: nanu yad anālambanaṃ tat kathaṃ jagadarthakāri viṣayeṇa vinotpattir ity āha |
SA02n800:116: kumāryā yad dṛśyamānam ajātam anutpannaṃ tat tasyā jātakaṃ yathotpannam ity arthaḥ |
SA02n800:119: īdṛśe svapnamāyāsadṛśe bimbe dṛṣṭe sati tatas tadanantaraṃ prāṇāyāmaṃ pūrakakumbhakarecakaṃ nirantaram anavacchinnaṃ kuryāt |
SA02n800:143: candras toyadhātur upāyasya śukradhātoḥ kāyo bhavati |
SA02n800:144: prajñāyā rajodhātor divākaras tejodhātur vāg bhavati |
SA02n800:147: prajñāṅgabhāvo hy upāye bhavati suratakāle cittasya tadākāratvāt |
SA02n800:152: yadādho viḍnāḍī niruddhā bhavati tadordhve vāmanāḍyām ariṣṭaṃ bhavati |
SA02n800:153: yadā mūtranāḍī niruddhā bhavati todordhve dakṣiṇanāḍyām ariṣṭaṃ bhavati |
SA02n800:164: divāniśam ahorātre dvādaśasaṃkrāntau pañcasaptatyadhikaṣaṭśataśvāsān madhyamā vahati |
SA02n800:165: vāmā dakṣinā ca nāḍī pañcasaptatyadhikaṣaṭśataśvāsonān yān ekaviṃśatisahasrān ṣaṭśatair adhikāṃs tān vahati |
SA02n800:166: tripakṣyadhikatrivarṣāṇi ca śatavarṣe pūrṇe vahati madhyamā |
SA02n800:167: vāmā savyā dakṣiṇordhve prāṇe yathākrameṇa saṃjñā candro'rkaś ca |
SA02n800:170: adha ity apāne madhyamā nāḍī cetyādinā |
SA02n800:173: ūrdhve yā vāmanāḍī sādho madhyā viḍnāḍī |
SA02n800:174: ūrdhve yā dakṣiṇā sādho vāmā mūtravāhiṇī |
SA02n800:190: adho nābhau guhye ca maṇyabje śaṅkhinī kāyavākcittavāhiṇī sattvarajastamobhedena tridvyekaguṇātmikā saṃhārakrameṇa nirgacchati |
SA02n800:192: eṣā śaṅkhinī strīṇāṃ sukhāt surate śukraṃ vahati |
SA02n800:199: yādhaḥ strīṇāṃ khagamukhā śukravāhataḥ saiva yadā rajo vahati tadā caṇḍālī bhavati |
SA02n800:200: tasminn eva cartukāle strīṇām ūrdhvanāḍī ḍombī bhavati |
SA02n800:202: puṃsaḥ puruṣasya tv ṛtukāle śukrāgamanakāle saiva ḍomby avadhūtī syāt |
SA02n800:207: madhye madhyamāmārge ṣaṣṭhaṃ jñānamaṇḍalam ākāśādipañcamaṇḍalāt pratyekamaṇḍalasya sapādaikādaśaśvāsān gṛhītvā sapādaṣaṭpañcāśataśvāsātmakaṃ vahati |
SA02n800:208: āsāṃ vāmadakṣiṇamadhyanāḍīnām ahorātreṇa yathākramaṃ nābhipadme dvādaśadalātmake ṣaṣṭimaṇḍalāni |
SA02n800:209: vāme ca lagne viṣame meṣādye dakṣiṇalagne same vṛṣabhādye |
SA02n800:210: tatra dakṣiṇe vṛṣalagne yadā vahati vāyus tadā mūle nāsāpuṭasyādhobhāge bhūmimaṇḍalaṃ daṇḍaikaṃ vahati |
SA02n800:220: ekā nāḍī kati śvāsān vahatīty āha |
SA02n800:226: aṣṭādaśaśataśvāsāṃś ca dvādaśasaṃkrāntibhir gaṇitā ahorātreṇa ṣaṭśatādhikaikaviṃśatisahasraśvāsā bhavanti |
SA02n800:229: dalamadhya iti yadā vāmanāḍyāṃ meṣādinā nāsāpuṭamadhye śūnyamaṇḍalaṃ vahati tadābhyantare'pi dalamadhye vahatīti vakṣyate |
SA02n800:230: tataḥ pūrva ity ūrdhve vāyumaṇḍalaṃ savye'gnimaṇḍalam |
SA02n800:237: pūrva ity ūrdhvamaṇḍale yathākramaṃ dharā pṛthivī vāyuś ca |
SA02n800:243: tathā hi parakulāliṅganena kāryodayo na svakulāliṅganena svātmani kriyā virodhāt |
SA02n800:256: śunyamaṇḍalasaṃyoga iti vāmadakṣiṇavāhināṃ daśamaṇḍalānāṃ saṃyoga ekatvaṃ madhyamā- (50)
SA02n800:259: karatale puṭite mūrdhni śirasi kṛta ekamukhaṃ vajraṃ bhavati |
SA02n800:261: madhyamāpravāha yogenācyutasukhena bodhicittoddhāriteṇa sā vajraśikhāyāṃ kartavyā |
SA02n800:270: vāmāyāṃ dakṣiṇāyāṃ vā yathākrameṇādhiko vāyur ekarātram |
SA02n800:278: hi sūryaś candraguṇāñ śabdasparśarasarūpagandhān gṛhītvāriṣṭadināni darśayati |
SA02n800:279: te pañca pañcakena pañcamī yāvad vṛddhiḥ |
SA02n800:280: tataḥ ṣaṣṭhasaptamarāśāv ekottareṇa kramād vṛddhir iti |
SA02n800:282: yatra prāṇasya nivṛttiḥ kaiścid api kartuṃ na śakyate |
SA02n800:287: avidyādvādaśāṅgasvarūpaḥ puṭo bhūmyādau likhitvā prathamapuṭe pūrvādiṣu makarādijanmarāśiprabhṛtāv ariṣṭadināvaśeṣāyuṣo varṣamāsadinabhedena yathākramanyāsam āha |
SA02n800:290: dinais tithidikpañcaguṇadvyekaiś caivaṃ dehinām āyur gacchati |
SA02n800:292: pūrve janmalagnapatre trivarṣād aśītyuttarasahasradinagaṇād makarāt pañcatriṃśadadhikaśatadinagaṇaṃ tyajati |
SA02n800:293: tatas tad apatraṃ śūnyīkṛtya dvitīyapatre'vaśeṣadinagaṇaṃ gṛhītvā prāṇaśaktiḥ praviśati |
SA02n800:299: tataḥ patraṃ śūnyīkṛtyāvaśeṣadinaṃ gṛhītvā pañcame praviśati |
SA02n800:307: aṣṭamaṃ śūnyīkṛtyāvaśeṣam ekaviṃśatidinaṃ gṛhītvā navame praviśati |
SA02n800:309: avaśeṣam ekādaśadinaṃ gṛhītvā daśame praviśati navamaṃ śūnyīkṛtya |
SA02n800:312: tata ekādaśamaṃ śūnyīkṛtyāvaśeṣadinatrayaṃ gṛhītvā dvādaśame praviśati |
SA02n800:314: avaśeṣaṃ dinam ekaṃ gṛhītvā karṇikāṃ praviśati |
SA02n800:317: sarvasya madhyasya trivarṣadinaiḥ prāṇaśaktir dvādaśarāśicakraṃ tyajati |
SA02n800:318: tato vijñānam api tyaktvā śvāsacakradharmapreritaprāṇavāyur nāsārandhragatyantare saṃbhramati |
SA02n800:321: mūlād iti prāṇasya janmarāśidinād ekottareṇa candrasyārohaṇakrameṇa caturmāsapakṣabhedādinā |
SA02n800:322: tatrāpi pūrvavad dvādaśacakraṃ likhitvā prathamapuṭe'riṣṭadinaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśadāyurmāsās tu dvitīyapuṭe sthāpanīyāḥ |
SA02n800:324: ariṣṭavṛddhidvitīyamāsānte tṛtīyamāsapraveśe tasminn eva patre dinadvayaṃ vahati |
SA02n800:334: tato dvitīye punaḥ saptāṣṭanavame ca māse yathāsaṃkhyaṃ catuṣpañcaṣaḍdināni vahanti |
SA02n800:360: evaṃ pañcaviṃśatiṣaḍviṃśatisaptaviṃśaddināni yadā vahati tadā navamaṃ patraṃ tyajati |
SA02n800:363: evam aṣṭāviṃśatitriṃśatidināni yadā vahati tadā daśamapatraṃ tyajati |
SA02n800:366: ekatriṃśaddinaṃ dvātriṃśaddinaṃ yadā vahati tadaikādaśamapatraṃ tyajati |
SA02n800:369: tataḥ pūrvapatre'vāhitadinatrayād dvādaśame patre dinadvayaṃ vahati |
SA02n800:372: yāvat prāṇasya sa cakravicchedo bhavati vāmāriṣṭeṇa maraṇam ayogino yānti | (56)
SA02n800:375: mṛtyoḥ kālasya śatavarṣe pūrṇe madhyamārohaṇaṃ samaviṣamadinair vṛṣādimeṣādyair janmajātaiś ca maṇḍalaiḥ pṛthivyādikaiḥ |
SA02n800:393: uṣṇīṣāt sakāśād ūrṇāpaṅkaje bhrūmadhye śukrasyāgamanam ānandaṃ prathamam |
SA02n800:395: tato vividhaṃ ramaṇaṃ krīḍanagāḍhāliṅganaśītkāra kaṇṭhakūjanādilakṣaṇaṃ nābhau (58)
SA02n800:397: guhye ca gataṃ bodhicittaṃ viramānandaṃ tṛtīyam |
SA02n800:398: guhyād vajramaṇiparyantam acyutaṃ bodhicittaṃ sahajānandaṃ caturtham |
SA02n800:408: uṣṇīṣe lalāṭe pūrṇā prathamānandādibhedena śukrapratipad dvitīyā tṛtīyā caturthī pañcamī lakṣaṇā |
SA02n800:410: kaṇṭhe hṛdaye ca ṣaṣṭhī saptamy aṣṭamī navamī daśamy aparā pūrṇā |
SA02n800:411: nābhau guhya ekādaśī dvādaśī trayodaśī caturdaśī pañcadaśī tṛtīyā pūrṇā |
SA02n800:413: guhyapadmā tayā bodhicitte guhye gate paramānandād yā ṣoḍaśī kalā sā maṇipadme vajramūrdhnigā bhavati |
SA02n800:414: tasmād ūrdhvaṃ kṛṣṇapratipadāgame virāgapraveśakāle cyutikālaḥ syāt |
SA02n800:416: asya sūryasya ṣoḍaśī kaloṣṇīṣakamale gatā saiva naṣṭacandra ity ākhyātaḥ |
SA02n800:424: sūrya eva rajo rajodharmitvād ūrdhve yāti |
SA02n800:426: yata evam ato'smāt kāraṇāc candrāmṛtasya śukradhātor ūrdhvam upari gamanam upadeśataḥ |
SA02n800:427: adhaś cārkarajaso gamanaṃ rāhulakṣaṇasya vijñānasyākṣarasukhaṃ gamanaṃ kartavyam iti |
SA02n800:430: candrāmṛtasya śukradhātoḥ pūrṇimā pūrṇatvaṃ buddhānām ūrṇābje bhavati |
SA02n800:432: tayoḥ pūrṇimāmāvāsyoḥ kalā yathākrameṇoṣṇīṣe vajramaṇau ca buddhānām iti | (61)
SA02n800:437: vajrapadaṃ jñānapadaṃ viparītam iti pratiṣṭhitam ity arthaḥ |
SA02n800:442: śiraso lambikānāṃ kāyavākcittajñānabindūnām ūrdhve krameṇākṣarasukhapūritānāṃ catuṣkāyaviśuddhim āha |
SA02n800:444: mahāsukhād iti vajrāgrād viparīteṇa yaḥ kāyabinduḥ sa turyākṣayataḥ śuddhakāyaḥ |
SA02n800:451: adha-upāyasyety adho vajrāgrād yat spharaṇaṃ kāyānāṃ tad upāyaś ca prajñāyāḥ punar ūrdhvato bhavet |
SA02n800:454: asyāḥ prajñāyāḥ kāyavajro lalāṭe pūrvavad viparīteṇa |
SA02n800:459: nanu candrasya sarvadā vṛddhyā bhavitavyam ity āha |
SA02n800:461: tathā hi yo vṛddhas tenāvaśyaṃ kṣayiṇā bhavitavyam anyathā nityatāprasaṅgaḥ |
SA02n800:462: na ca nityo'rthaḥ kaścid asti yena tasya nityatvaṃ parikalpanīyam |
SA02n800:464: tathāpy utpādavyaya eva tasya svabhāvo bhavatu |
SA02n800:466: svabhāvābhāvadharmāṇām iti svabhāvasyābhāvo yeṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yaḥ kṣayotpādaḥ sā māyā | (63)
SA02n800:468: ata eva na kṣayaṃ yānti bhūtāni na jāyanta iti saṃyogaviyogamātratvāt |
SA02n800:471: svaprajñāyā vividhalakṣaṇayāliṅgitaṃ cittaṃ padme guhye gataṃ yad maṇau vajramaṇau tac candragataspandarūpeṇa spandabhāvanā |
SA02n800:474: yadā hi gurūpadeśena praviṣṭe marīcikādimārge tadā tisro nāḍyaḥ pariśuddhā bhavanti |
SA02n800:475: tāsu pariśuddhāsu yadi kāyanāḍyāṃ prāṇo vahati tathāpi prāṇāyāmaḥ kartavyaḥ sa ca kāyabhāvanā |
SA02n800:478: yadā śaṅkhinīnāḍyāṃ śukranāḍyāṃ jñānabhāvanākṣarabhāvanā bhavati tadā samāhāra ekatvaṃ trivajrāṇāṃ trināḍīnām |
SA02n800:482: śiraso lalāṭāt pūrṇāpadaṃ guhyasthānaṃ bandhanaṃ paramārthata iti prāṇabandhanenākṣarasukhena |
SA02n800:483: vāsanety āvaraṇaṃ tasyā haraṇam apanayanam | tat pūrṇa- (64)
SA02n800:485: candrasya na cchedo na ca tasya pūraṇam |
SA02n800:486: tathoditaṃ jñānaṃ kramāt spandādibhedena bhūmibhir muditādyābhir ūrdhvam uṣṇīṣe pūrṇatāṃ yāti |
SA02n800:488: na jñānacchedo na ca tasya pūraṇam iti |
SA02n800:490: tena pūrṇāyāṃ na śaśī sthiraḥ pratipatpraveśakālakṣayatvāt |
SA02n800:493: jagatāṃ rāgavirāgābhyāṃ pūrṇā na pratiṣṭhitety āha |
SA02n800:495: ekakṣaṇābhisaṃbuddhaṃ yadā pūrṇāyāṃ guhyapadme niścalaṃ cittaṃ bhavet tadā taccittaṃ vajraṃ vajramaṇau niṣpandena sarvakṣaṇapūrakaṃ dvyayutadvyaṣṭaśataśvāsalakṣaṇam | (65)
SA02n800:497: evam asya cittasya na śuklapakṣe rāge sthitiḥ |
SA02n800:498: na ca gamanam asite pakṣe virāge |
SA02n800:499: ate eva pakṣadvayamadhyasthaṃ pūrṇāyāṃ gatam advayam apratiṣṭhitam |
SA02n800:505: tasya bodhisattvasyoṣṇīṣād udayaṃ pūrṇā vajramaṇau bhavet |
SA02n800:506: sa virāgāt kalāhāniḥ kalāya cayo vajrāt sakāśād bhavati |
SA02n800:508: punar apy evam udayaḥ punar maṇau pūrṇatā |
SA02n800:509: sa virāgāt kalāhānir na dehināṃ jñānahānir iti |
SA02n800:513: asya bodhicittasya mahāsukhasvabhāvaḥ sa pūrṇāśabdena bhaṇyate |
SA02n800:518: asya bodhicittasya niścalasya pūrṇāyāṃ guhyapadma ūrdhvam bhūmibhiḥ paripūrṇatā |
SA02n800:520: pakṣadvayaṃ vāmadakṣiṇaṃ meṣavṛṣādidvādaśarāśilakṣaṇam ākramya nirudhya dvādaśākārasatyārthaṃ dvādaśabhūmilābhataḥ |
SA02n800:523: ekārtham advayam iti yad advayadharmaṃ tad ekārtham ubhayapa- (67)
SA02n800:532: nadīnām udakaṃ praviṣṭaṃ tat samudre samatvaṃ yāti |
SA02n800:533: tathāyaṃ bhāvasamūhaḥ sthiracalātmako'kṣare sarvākārabimbe samas tulyo'kṣaro bhavati |
SA02n800:535: ayaṃ dhātusamūho lohādiko raseṇa pāradeṇa bhakṣito yathā rasatvaṃ yāti tat samo bhavati |
SA02n800:536: yathā vā bījaiḥ kādravādikaiḥ kṣityādiko dhātusamūho bhakṣito bījasvabhāvatvaṃ yāti |
SA02n800:537: sa eva phalakāle phalodayakāle mānavarjitaḥ saṃkhyārahito bhavati | (68)
SA02n800:539: evaṃ bhāvasamūho'pi sthiracalātmakaḥ paramākṣarabhakṣitaḥ sarvākārabimbena nirāvaraṇīkṛtaḥ paramākṣaratvam āyāti |
SA02n800:543: pūrṇāvasthāṃ vyāpitvaṃ gate viṣe daṣṭako daṃśasthāne vedanāduḥkhaṃ na vetti |
SA02n800:545: na ca viṣayān rūpādīn indriyadvāraiś cakṣurādibhir vetti |
SA02n800:546: evaṃ citte pūrṇakalāṃ gate vyāpitvaṃ gate na yogī vajramaṇau vetti satsukhaṃ nānyatrāpi na viṣayān indriyadvārair iti |
SA02n800:549: sarvataḥ smṛtimāl loke sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati || iti |
SA02n800:557: yathā śilā mahāmaṇisparśāt taptatāṃ prabhāsvaratāṃ yāti tathākṣarasukhasparśāt sukhatām eti yāti vai niścitam |
SA02n800:558: kiṃ punaḥ paramārthataḥ paramārthasatyato jñānasadbhāvaḥ prabhāvo vitarkaḥ |
SA02n800:559: kiṃ tarkaṇīyaś cittasyāvedhanaṃ prati malāgantukaliptasya naivety arthaḥ |
SA02n800:561: atha citta utpanne sati paścād utpannas tadartham āha |
SA02n800:562: na cittāt sakāśāc cirakālikaḥ paścād utpanna ity arthaḥ |
SA02n800:563: atha cittaṃ vinā jātas tadartham āha |
SA02n800:570: yady ayam āgantuko malas tāmre tadā pūrvaṃ tāmraṃ kālikārahitam |
SA02n800:571: yadā cirakālī malaḥ paścāt tāmrasya sadbhāvas tadā tasya malasya kutaḥ kasmāt saṃbhavaḥ |
SA02n800:572: atha tāmreṇa vinā jātas tadākāśakusumasyāpi saṃ- (70)
SA02n800:574: bhavaḥ | atha tāmre'vyayatvena saṃsthitas tadā siddharaseṇāpy apanetuṃ na śakyate |
SA02n800:575: tasmāt sarvam etad yuktyā na saṃgacchati |
SA02n800:577: tāmreṇa sahotpanno'py ayaṃ kāliko rasayogād naśyati na paścād na pūrvaṃ na tadrahita iti |
SA02n800:580: āgantukaśabdaḥ kathaṃ boddhavya iti ced ucyate |
SA02n800:584: yauvane surate prāptā svayam eva vetti |
SA02n800:591: yadi teṣāṃ virāgasaṃbhūtir na bhavati tadā nānyaprakāreṇa (71)
SA02n800:598: ādhāre cyutim āpanna ādheyasya virāgatā bhavati |
SA02n800:599: ataś cyutirāgaṃ vivarjayed ity uktena saṃbandhaḥ |
SA02n800:602: akṣarodbhavakāyasya cittasyorṇācakramadhyagatasyālikālyor vāmadakṣiṇayoḥ samāyogo mīlanaṃ madhyamāpravāhitvaṃ hūṃkārādyaṃ ca madhyamāpravāhanibandhanaṃ neṣyate |
SA02n800:603: etac ca paramākṣarajñānasiddhāv evāryapuṇḍarīkapādaiḥ prapāñcitam iti na vistāryate |
